$schema.description: Add this to allow defining the schema, useful for IDE integration

namespace.description: The namespace of the object and relation in this tuple.

relation.description: The relation of the object and subject.

object.description: The object affected by this relation.

oneOf.description: The subject set affected by this relation. Uses the encoding of "<namespace>:<object>#<relation>".
The subject affected by this relation. Use "<namespace>:<object>#<relation>" to describe a subject set.
